headline: Molson Coors CEO Gavin Hattersley to step down
summary: The Blue Moon brewer said it would consider internal and external applicants in its search for a new chief executive.

headline: Molson Coors Up 13.1% in 6 Months: Buy, Hold or Avoid the Stock?
summary: TAP makes significant progress with the Acceleration Plan. It is focused on portfolio premiumization as well.

headline: Molson Coors to lose CEO Gavin Hattersley by the end of 2025 after transformational run and record $11.6 billion revenue milestone
summary: The Molson Coors board has begun a formal search for his successor, considering both internal and external candidates.

raw.headline: Molson Coors to lose CEO Gavin Hattersley by the end of 2025 after transformational run and record $11.6 billion revenue milestone
raw.summary: The Molson Coors board has begun a formal search for his successor, considering both internal and external candidates.

headline: Molson Coors CEO Hattersley to Retire by End of Year
summary: Molson Coors on Monday announced that CEO Gavin Hattersley plans to retire by the end of the year after a six-year stint at the helm of the brewer.

raw.headline: Molson Coors CEO Hattersley to Retire by End of Year
raw.summary: Molson Coors on Monday announced that CEO Gavin Hattersley plans to retire by the end of the year after a six-year stint at the helm of the brewer.

headline: Molson Coors Beverage Company CEO Gavin Hattersley Announces Plans to Retire by End of 2025; Board Launches Search Process
summary: GOLDEN, Colo. & MONTREAL, April 14, 2025--Molson Coors Beverage Company ("Molson Coors" or the "Company") (NYSE: TAP, TAP.A; TSX: TPX.A, TPX.B) today announced that after 28 years in the beer industry, including over six years as President and CEO of Molson Coors Beverage Company, Gavin Hattersley has informed the Company and the Board of Directors (the "Board") that he intends to retire from the Company and as a member of the Board, in each case, by December 31, 2025.

raw.headline: Molson Coors Beverage Company CEO Gavin Hattersley Announces Plans to Retire by End of 2025; Board Launches Search Process
raw.summary: GOLDEN, Colo. & MONTREAL, April 14, 2025--Molson Coors Beverage Company ("Molson Coors" or the "Company") (NYSE: TAP, TAP.A; TSX: TPX.A, TPX.B) today announced that after 28 years in the beer industry, including over six years as President and CEO of Molson Coors Beverage Company, Gavin Hattersley has informed the Company and the Board of Directors (the "Board") that he intends to retire from the Company and as a member of the Board, in each case, by December 31, 2025.

headline: Molson Coors CEO to retire after 6 years at the helm
summary: Gavin Hattersley led the expansion of the Coors Banquet maker’s “Beyond Beer” portfolio.
